Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IEffect, Eamon, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Well, you've been to the Beginner's Cave, but do you really feel ready to tackle that big world out there on your own? Maybe you don't, and that's why we've set **002

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: up this practice facility for adventurers of little or no experience. To challenge you, the complex is stocked daily with beasts, non-humans, criminals, and other perils, not to mention $TREASURE$. NOTE: The adventurer enters at **003

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: their own risk! The management assumes no legal responsibility for the safety of the adventurer. Good luck!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The woman speaks in a soft voice: "You seem honorable enough. I will go with you and maybe we will both make it out with our lives."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You hear a voice from behind the door to the north: "Help me, help me! I am held captif in zis room! Somebodee let me out!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The female elf speaks: "I am Sylvani and my partner is Don Jonson. We seek peace and would rather be friends instead of enemies with you. Cooperation would be beneficial for all of us."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you cast the spell, a warm glow comes from the mural where Thor's hammer used to be. You realize that the weapon is materializing and becoming real!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The book reads, "For most purposes the Excamian Fire-Newt is the ideal lifeform for alchemical concoctions. In the event of the unavailability of this type, the Purple Chameleon of Og is a suitable substitution..." It goes on and on.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The book reads, "I am life...You are life...The world is a flower...The universe is pink..." You don't care to read much more of this garbage.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The book reads, "Thaddeus the Scholar was possibly the most learned man who ever lived. The period of his greatest works was about 253 E.A.R." (about 500 years ago) "Legends say that his body lies in a great tomb, but no one has found it."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "Special for novice mages!! By reciting these simple magic words <PRESTO BLAMMO KAPOWIE> you can cast the BLAST spell four times a day or more!" The scroll vanishes as you read the words, but you feel that you have a new magic power! (Check w/STATUS.)

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you remove the purple book from the bookshelf, you hear a grating noise as a part of the wall turns and opens up to reveal a secret room to the east!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you remove the obsidian scroll case, there is a flicker of light as a large human figure materializes in the corner of the room!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The Emerald Warrior takes the case containing the Scroll of Power. "Now the power is finally mine!" he shouts. He then laughs maniacally and disappears as quickly as he materialized.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You hear sounds of a scuffle around the bend to the east!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Zapf the Conjurer begins to murmur magic incantations and wave his staff around wildly. He then utters a shout and leaps into the air! As he lands with a stomp, there is a flash of light and a puff of smoke!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A huge man in uniform comes out to inspect you. "I'm the manager." he says.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "Well, I'm afraid you're overqualified. You'll have to return to town."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "You don't look old enough to be doing this, but I'm gonna let you in anyway."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Bozworth frowns at you and then vanishes before you can hit him!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Bozworth dodges your blast and then vanishes in a puff of smoke!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Jacques says, "How can I ever zank you?"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It says, "If you are reading this... then you can't be watching... ...your back!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It says, "Conan's sword is sharper than he is."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It says, "What's uglier than an orc? ...... Nothing!!!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It says, "Hewg the Sorcerer wuz here."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It says, "Assassins do it from behind."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "Thanks, buddy, but a potion costs 100 gold pieces."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "Sorry, bub, all out. But thanks for asking."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "Hey, thanks for the tip, pal!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The gnome takes your money and gives you a potion.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You strike fear into the hearts of your foes when you invoke the power of the Hammer of Thor!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: ZAP!! You are struck by lightning!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: ****** WELCOME TO THE BARROW DOWNS TRAINING GROUND! ****** *001

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: LARGE OVEN.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You're an inexperienced adventurer, but you know how to listen and pick up some good info once in a while. When you heard that there was a place outside of town that gave beginning adventurers a chance to hone their skills and pick up some loot in **037

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: the process, naturally you jumped at the opportunity to make the most of this deal.*038

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: So, you hitchhiked your way out there, and readied your weapons and yourself as you approached the Main entrance...

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089
